Name: DreamerDeadCountArea
Notes: Counts the player's deaths that occur inside this area and stores them in the save data for the currently selected galaxy mission. This number is used to control the appearance of a Tip Network (Dreamer) or a Cosmic Spirit (SuperDreamer).

SW_APPEAR.Description: The object will appear when this switch is activated.

SW_AWAKE.Description: Enables rendering and resumes updates when this switch is active.
